select count(*) from word where create_user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from word_snapshot ws where ws.user_id = #{userId} and type = 1
select count(*) from label_ref lr left join word w on lr.ref_uuid = w.uuid where lr.label_uuid = #{collectionUUId} and lr.ref_type = 2 and lr.create_user_id = #{userId}
